name: Veni :)
greetingText: I really like your name btw :)
wishText:
May this year be more wonderful and blessed.

Thank you for being born and i will always be with you.

SO SMILE AND BE HAPPY :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Veni !! I hope you blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Yeayyyy udahhh :)) haha aku jadi buat yang simple aja. Pokoknya mulai detik ini kamu gaboleh kasar dan harus pakai aku kamu yaa hihi
